name: Spirit of Omen: Stone Drake
description:
End Phase: Deals 1 Geo DMG.
Usage(s): 3

When this Summon is in play, when Eremite Stone Enchanter takes DMG: DMG received reduced by 2. Consume 1 additional Usage(s) when negating Geo DMG. (Once per Round. Usage consumption required)
